summary: A collection of test fixture modules used by the flake8‑class‑attributes plugin test suite. They contain example class definitions that either should trigger linting errors (e.g., missing or misplaced class attributes) or are valid cases (constants, special attributes, dataclasses, and typing.Protocols) that the plugin must accept or ignore.
business_intent: Provide concrete code samples to validate the plugin’s detection of class‑attribute rule violations and its ability to skip checks for dataclasses and typing.Protocol subclasses, ensuring reliable linting behavior.
